section.p: This method allows users to report call quality issues. You need to call it after leaving the channel.
This method allows users to report call quality issues. It must be called after leaving the channel.

This method allows users to report issues with call quality. It must be called after leaving the channel.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li:
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
-1: General error (not categorized).
-2: Invalid parameter.
-7: Method called before is initialized.

< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
-1: General error (not specifically classified).
-2: Invalid parameter.
-7: Method called before is initialized.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li:
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
-1: General error (not specifically classified).
-2: Invalid parameter.
-7: is not initialized before calling the method.
